title: Black Friday Home Deals 2024: Day Two Is Upon Us
description: It’s a marathon, not a sprint
author: Rachel Fletcher
excerpt: From our favorite bedding to the air purifiers and vacuums we can't live without, shop our favorite Black Friday home deals before time runs out.
text: Thanks to the best Black Friday home deals, there’s no reason to be up at the crack of dawn or chasing down deals in store. In fact, the sales have been rolling in for days and our team has been busy parsing through the best of the best. From major discounts on bed linens and mattresses to $150 off covetable Le Creuset pieces, now is a great time to tackle shopping for holiday gifts, gadgets, high-end furniture, and even holiday decor.Though you may have your mind set on a world of robot vacuums, air fryers, or Apple AirPods, don’t let the items that really upgrade your home decor go unnoticed. From a striking sectional or kitchen appliances like a chic Dutch oven to trendy rugs and chairs for every room of the home, we pulled together the best Black Friday deals so you skip coupon searching and stay at home.Our Best Black Friday Home DealsBest Sheet Black Friday Deal: Cozy Earth Bamboo Sheet Set, $339 $232Best Mattress Black Friday Deal: Avocado Green Mattress, $1,999 $1,699Best Holiday Black Friday Deal: Balsam Hill Fraser Fir Tree, $799 $549Best Bedding Black Friday Deal: Parachute Cloud Cotton Quilt, $289 $217Best Air Purifier Black Friday Deal: Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool HP07 Air Purifier, Heater, and Fan, $750 $530Black Office Chair Black Friday Deal: Branch Ergonomic Chair, $329 $279Best Bed Frame Black Friday Deal: Wayfair Abdiel Upholstered Platform Storage Bed, $229 $148Best Sectional Sofa Black Friday Deal: Muse Sofa from Design Within Reach $3,495 $2,490Best TV Deal: The Samsung Frame TV, $1,500 $900 from SamsungShop by sectionBlack Friday Home Deals: Appliance & TechBlack Friday Home Deals: Furniture & DecorBlack Friday Home Deals: Bedding & MattressesBlack Friday Home Deals: Holiday DecorTech and Appliance Black Friday Home DealsThis is the absolute best time of year to buy a TV, an air purifier, vacuum, coffee maker or any electronic device. There is a lot to wade through right now, so we’re focusing on what we believe are the best buys per retailer on the Internet right now. Peruse the offerings from Amazon, Wayfair, Dyson and more—but don’t wait too long, many of these deals expire by midnight on Monday December 2.AmazonTime and time again, the mega-retailer has proven that it has some of the best early access deals around. We’ve spotted thousands of products on markdown in the home category, whether you’re looking for discounted smart Wi-Fi TVs, Dyson vacuum cleaners, or standing desks. Our tried and true? Bestsellers like Levoit Air purifiers and humidifiers or a KitchenAid stand mixer. Even our very favorite bath towels and bed sheets from the retailer are at the lowest price we’ve seen this year. Read our full Amazon Black Friday story to see what else we’ll be snagging throughout the weekend.KitchenAid Artisan Stand MixerLEVOIT Smart Home Air PurifierChakir Turkish Linens Bathroom Towels (Set of 4)De'Longhi Magnifica Evo Espresso & Coffee MachineWayfairMuch like Amazon, Wayfair always offers unbeatable prices on an extensive inventory of products. The major retailer already keeps things pretty affordable, but their Black Friday deals really knock things out of the park (see our full story on that here). Checking out all the low prices on decor is a good place to start, but don’t forget deals on other bigger items like mattresses, appliances (we see you Dyson cordless vacuums and deeply discounted Ninja blenders), and more.Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum CleanerNinja Professional Blender 1000Sealy to Go 12" Medium Memory Foam MattressAndover Mills Abdiel Upholstered Platform BedDysonThe holy grail of home tech is offering up to $300 off their wares as we speak. While it applies to select items only, we spotted quite a few AD favorite vacuums and air purifiers with slashed price tags, including the Absolute cordless vac and the multitalented Dyson Purifier Humidify+Cool Formaldehyde. We can say with the utmost expertise that these are some of the lowest prices you'll see on Dyson goods all year. If a vacuum is all you have eyes (or budget) for this Black Friday you can see all of our faves on sale in this vacuum specific story.Dyson V8 Absolute Cordless VacuumDyson Purifier Humidify+Cool FormaldehydeSamsungName a classier TV than the Frame, we’ll wait. The Yves Behar designed product was an instant classic when it debuted in 2017, and we’ve been spotting it in countless celebrity homes (and homes of stylish non-famous people) ever since. If you’re eager to try one for yourself, every size is discounted (up to $1,000 off the largest models). Their stylish cordless vacuum, the Bespoke Jet (a favorite of our contributor Terri Williams) isn’t too hard on the eyes—or wallet, for the time being–either. Terri praised the Bespoke Jet's self-emptying, self-charging capabilities saying the machine “takes the cleaning process to another level.”SAMSUNG BESPOKE Jet Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner w/ Clean Station55" Class The Frame QLED 4K LS03BBlack Friday Home Deals: Furniture & DecorIf new furniture is on your shopping list for the next year, there is truly no better time to purchase than right now. We might not see prices this low again on sofas, sectionals (more on that here), dining or office chairs and tables of all shapes and sizes until next Cyber Week. Hop to it with some of our favorite trusted retailers, listed below.Serena & LilyOpen the Serena & Lily homepage and you’ll find one simple message: “Sale of the year.” The coastal-inspired retailer is discounting high quality furniture, bedding, and decor with various markdowns.Belvedere Flannel Duvet CoverSerena & Lily Albion Mohair ThrowEllington Side TableWave MirrorCastleryCastlery is running a buy more save more deal on furniture finds like an MCM-style dining set or equally charming TV stand. We dedicated an entire story to the pieces we’re eyeing while the sale lasts.Castlery Harper TV StandCastlery Madison Chaise Sectional SofaPottery BarnThere are literally thousands of products on sale at Pottery Barn right now, but we did a little digging and found the best of the best, if we do say so ourselves. You can pick up great toy storage, bedding, and furniture for the smaller people in your life for the best price all year. We are also partial to their area rugs and this chic stainless steel ice bucket. Check out our full Pottery Barn Black Friday roundup here or enjoy this pared down selection of favorites below.Pottery Barn Dream Modular Sofa Chaise SectionalCrafthouse Ice Bucket with TongsPottery Barn Merrin Hand-Knotted Wool RugAnthropologieNow’s the perfect time to stock up on on-trend luxury furniture and decor at Anthropologie. The retailer’s early Black Friday deals are sweet, with up to 60% off sale items. On our list? Ornate credenzas, swirly tapered candles, statement mirrors, and plush armchairs.Anthropologie Bree Mirrored ShelfAnthropologie Woven Petunia Kori Modular Armless SofaWest ElmShow me a design lover who doesn’t have at least a few pieces from West Elm and I’ll show you one surprised home editor. For those who also find themselves constantly shopping the Brooklyn-based brand’s minimalist bedding and reliable mid-century modern style furniture, we’ve got good news—the home brand is currently offering up to 70% off a selection of their stock. That is not a small discount, so spend it wisely—perhaps on something from their Billy Cotton collection or their beloved Dalton sectional!West Elm Billy Cotton Bennett Floor LampWest Elm Dalton Two-Piece Chaise SectionalBranchWhen we asked around about the best ergonomic office chairs, contributor Terri Williams told us the Ergonomic chair from Branch “looks as good as it feels.” Use code BFCM to save up to 30% and get free shipping on any order from Branch.Branch Ergonomic ChairBranch Verve ChairArticleArticle has has come through with up to 40% off a selection of their stock right now. Whether you’re redecorating the living room or upgrading your home office, you can now get up to 40% off stylish furniture for every room in the house—and they‘ve added new discounts since the sale kicked off earlier this week, so keep checking back. Their sofas are already affordable—and we know for a fact that they’re well made—so this is your time to make it happen.Article Sven SofaArticle Cilo Ivory Bouclé OttomanSSENSEIf you try plan your year around SSENSE’s confusing sale schedule, you’re in luck—right now, save up to 50% off select items that'll make great gifts for everyone on your list or even a nice pick-me-up for yourself. And did we mention they carry great furniture pieces as well?FERM LIVING Brown Os Salad ServersSTUDIO KALLANG Black & Beige Small Onde MirrorDesign Within ReachNot to exaggerate here but this is pretty much unheard of: The entirety of DWR’s stock is 25% off right now. There are iconic pieces from Noguchi and Herman Miller on sale (including the cult-favorite Aeron and Embody office chairs) as well as modern classics like the Sarah Ellison Muse Sofa and all things Muuto and HAY. If that’s not enticing enough, you’ll find hoards of midcentury sofas, coffee tables, and modern accessories like rugs and tableware from Knoll and handful of other brands that are all an extra 5% off with the code SAVE5.Herman Miller Aeron ChairJ.L.Møllers Møbelfabrik Moller Model 57 ArmchairBertoia Side ChairEllison Studios Muse SofaSoho HomeIf you’ve ever wanted your house’s decor to look like the inside of Soho House without the membership fees, now is your chance. The London-based social club sells its own line of home goods (Soho Home) inspired by the decor it uses to outfit its physical locations across the world, allowing members and non-members to keep the social spirit alive without actually visiting a Soho House in person. While each club has a distinct personality, the through lines remain the same, giving each one a familiar feeling while still being inspired by its location, such as London, New York, Barcelona or Los Angeles. Right now you can save 20% off the entire range of categories, which include furniture, textiles, accessories and dining products.Margeaux Oblong CushionSoho Home Vivienne ArmchairArhausThis is Cyber Week furniture deals at their best: Save up to 20% off during the Arhaus Cyber Monday sale. The deals apply to holiday decor, home accents like throws and pillows, and tons of high end furniture, including staff faves like the Kipton sofa. Here is a snippet from AD Pro associate director Lila Allen’s review of the Kipton to get you moving in the right direction: “I find this sofa to be really cushy and enveloping, but let’s be clear: This is not an upright and formal sit,” she says of the piece. “It’s lazy and low, but still supportive. My feet tend to dangle toddler-style if I’m facing forward and really sinking into my slouch, but an ottoman (or coffee table—sorry, mom) fixes that. When I want to be more upright, I find myself sometimes sitting cross-legged, and have plenty of support through the back cushion. The upholstery on the frame is tight and flawless.”Wagner Round Dining TableKipton SofaRevival RugsOne of our very favorite rug makers is offering up to 30% off sitewide as we speak! We just wrapped up testing their Hart Jute area rug and it received the accolade of “best Just Rug” when all was said and done. Here is what senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums enjoys about the piece: “I love a jute rug as a neutral, durable, area rug,” she says. “This one softened up a multipurpose guest room/office that’s frequented by cats who enjoy clawing the furniture, a.k.a. this rug can handle some claws and not look worse for the wear. This large, affordable rug is the perfect way to add texture to a space without dominating the design, and it seems incredibly durable.” Speaking of affordable, this particular model is $75 off for an 8'x10' rug.Revival Hart Jute RugSixpennyAt this point we have maybe lost track of how many AD editors have Sixpenny products in their homes (global editorial director Amy Astley even has one in her office!). We have tested many Nevas, Oleas, and Esmé’s from the brand—and the reviews are all positive! Good thing the Brooklyn-based brand is currently offering 20% off sitewide. Take it from Zoë Sessums once again, who has had the Neva sectional sofa in her home for several years.“Two-year update: My Neva sectional has continued to be a wonderful piece of furniture and you would never guess that I’ve had it for this long,” she says. “It’s amazing that all the cushions still have so much oomph—I don’t feel like any of them have less fullness or support. My cats love sleeping on the top of the back cushions, so sometimes I have to perk them up and squish the fill around—but it always springs back. I’ve had many houseguests, many dogs, and many children enjoy the sofa. It’s held up for tall friends sleeping over, it’s held up for small children pretending it’s a trampoline, and it’s held up when a new dog decides to chase my cats across the cushions. This sofa feels nearly indestructible!”Sixpenny Neva Chaise SectionalBlack Friday Home Deals: Bedding & MattressesPlanning to spend a good amount of time under the covers in 2025? Us, too. And for that we'll all need the best foundation possible: fresh sheets, great loungewear, and a nice set of towels to wash the day away. There is something you should probably know about us: we love sleep. So much so that we've tested upwards of 30 mattresses and sleep-related products, all in the name of making sure you have recommendations you can rely on. Much like furniture, Cyber Week is the time to invest in a mattress at a discounted price if you're looking to enter the new year with a new sleep setup. A few (OK, quite a few) of our favorite are below. And we also have a dedicated roundup of all of the best Black Friday mattress deals we have come across.Cozy EarthIf you’re searching for some super-cozy sheets, bath towels, or loungewear, check out Cozy Earth’s early Black Friday sale. We’re partial to the cooling bamboo sheet set, which features a sateen finish that feels silky to the touch whenever you snuggle in. Commerce editor Audrey Lee was taken with her set immediately: “Sleeping on these sheets felt like being draped in a luxuriously lightweight silk that often had me wishing I didn’t have to get out of bed in the morning” she says. “At first, I immediately noticed how next-level soft the bamboo viscose fabric was and how nicely the fitted sheet clung my bed.”Cozy Earth Bamboo Sheet SetCozy Earth Silk PillowCozy Earth Linen Bamboo Duvet CoverCozy Earth ComforterCozy Earth Women’s Stretch-Knit Bamboo Kimono RobeParachuteA wide swatch of Parachute products are deeply discount right now, from the brand’s cozy duvets to the crowd favorite robe that made our Editor’s Picks gift guide. While the brand offers percale and linen, it’s their Cloud products that really set them apart from the crowd. “I’ve never felt more luxurious than when I wrap myself up in this cushy robe post-shower,” says commerce producer Lauren Arzbaecher of her Cloud Cotton Robe. “Wash after wash, it’s stayed super soft.”Cloud Cotton RobeOrganic Cloud Cotton QuiltLinen Shower CurtainParachute Linen Duvet CoverAvocadoThe Black Friday sale season is hands down the best time to buy a mattress. Get quality, organic sleep in time for the holiday season with up to 20% off a top-rated Avocado mattress or 10% off accoutrements like a mattress topper or pillow. Looking for more fabulous mattress savings? We‘ve got you covered there, too.Avocado GreenAvocado Eco Organic Mattress Topper, Queen SizeBoll & BranchIf you’re on the hunt for classic and luxurious bedding to curl up in (and who isn’t?), you can find select styles available at some mega discounts on Boll & Branch. Save 25% on orders over $300 with the code CYBER25. Contributor Erika Owen recommends the Hemmed Duvet Set, “especially if you’re a hot sleeper prone to night sweats” or one of their organic sheet sets.Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed Duvet SetFlannel Classic Plaid Duvet SetBuffyBuffy, creators of the original Cloud Comforter (tested and reviewed by us!) and lighter weight little sibling the Breeze, are offering 25% off sitewide for Cyber Week. If you haven’t given Buffy a try yet, here is a sneak peek at what senior digital design editor Sydney Gore had to say about the Cloud: “I’ve been using this comforter since the brand dropped it in 2017 and have never looked back. It’s light, soft, breathable…everything you would ever want in a comforter that stays on your bed all year round.”Buffy Cloud ComforterRalph LaurenIf your taste skews more Americana—or you want to channel Yolanda Hadid’s Texas ranch—you might want to see what classic Ralph Lauren styles are currently up to 40% off for the holiday weekend. Go nautical with some striped bedding or deck the halls with a They’ve also discounted great glassware and very giftable decor so you can get your holiday shopping done simultaneously.Ralph Lauren Home Organic Cotton Shirting Stripe SheetingRalph Lauren Home Hudson Plaid OrnamentSaatvaWhether you’re looking for a light bedding refresh like a fresh new pillow or a total overhaul of your sleep setup (we’re talking mattress, bed frame, the whole deal) Saatva’s very good Cyber Week sale is the place to go for luxury bedding at solid discounts.Saatva Latex PillowSaatva Rx MattressMorrow Soft GoodsNo one does color quite like the team at Morrow Soft Goods. The brand excels in earthy neutrals that don’t feel crunchy granola and remain elevated. We’re also fans of their checked, striped, and ticking patterns. Right now, select items on the site are 20% off. Items that are marked as final sale are 30% off (a fair bet if you’d like to stock up on old faithfuls!). The sale runs through December 3rd and we have a feeling stock is limited, as it tends to be with smaller and more homegrown brands, so get to it.Adela Throw BlanketHeirloom Linen Classic Sheet SetNectar: Up to 40% off everythingIf you’re looking to score a new mattress (at a discount!), consider one of AD’s most decorated sleep brands, Nectar. The Nectar mattress, which has received the top mattress award in our Sleep Awards is a somewhat unbelievable $917 off during Cyber Week. Not one but two of our staffers–senior SEO manager Katie Henwood and digital features editor Nick Mafi–have slept soundly on their Nectar purchases and we can recommend it without hesitation. If you want a one-stop-shopping experience, you can also pick up a new bed frame to support your investment.The Nectar Memory Foam MattressThe Nectar Platform BedCoyuchiWe have put Coyuchi linens to the test and, so far, they have stood both the test of time and the test of design editors. Global features director, Sam Cochran, described the organic relaxed linen sheets this year as “heavy, quality linen,” and this set, along with everything else at the luxe linen brand is 25% off, plus free shipping.Coyuchi Organic Relaxed Linen SheetsDouble-Stitched Quilted Organic Cotton ComforterBalsam HillThe perfect artificial Christmas tree does exist—and you can find it at Balsam Hill, along with and all the trimmings you need to nail your holiday decor. We’ve tested several of their trees ourselves and can attest to the quality and longevity of their products, so you might want to act fast because they do in fact sell out.Balsam Hill Fraser Fir TreeBalsam Hill Alpine Balsam Fir TreeBalsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce
html:
Thanks to the best Black Friday home deals, there’s no reason to be up at the crack of dawn or chasing down deals in store. In fact, the sales have been rolling in for days and our team has been busy parsing through the best of the best. From major discounts on bed linens and mattresses to $150 off covetable Le Creuset pieces, now is a great time to tackle shopping for holiday gifts, gadgets, high-end furniture, and even holiday decor.

Though you may have your mind set on a world of robot vacuums, air fryers, or Apple AirPods, don’t let the items that really upgrade your home decor go unnoticed. From a striking sectional or kitchen appliances like a chic Dutch oven to trendy rugs and chairs for every room of the home, we pulled together the best Black Friday deals so you skip coupon searching and stay at home.

Our Best Black Friday Home Deals

  • Best Sheet Black Friday Deal: Cozy Earth Bamboo Sheet Set, $339 $232
  • Best Mattress Black Friday Deal: Avocado Green Mattress, $1,999 $1,699
  • Best Holiday Black Friday Deal: Balsam Hill Fraser Fir Tree, $799 $549
  • Best Bedding Black Friday Deal: Parachute Cloud Cotton Quilt, $289 $217
  • Best Air Purifier Black Friday Deal: Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool HP07 Air Purifier, Heater, and Fan, $750 $530
  • Black Office Chair Black Friday Deal: Branch Ergonomic Chair, $329 $279
  • Best Bed Frame Black Friday Deal: Wayfair Abdiel Upholstered Platform Storage Bed, $229 $148
  • Best Sectional Sofa Black Friday Deal: Muse Sofa from Design Within Reach $3,495 $2,490
  • Best TV Deal: The Samsung Frame TV, $1,500 $900 from Samsung

Shop by section

  • Black Friday Home Deals: Appliance & Tech
  • Black Friday Home Deals: Furniture & Decor
  • Black Friday Home Deals: Bedding & Mattresses
  • Black Friday Home Deals: Holiday Decor

Tech and Appliance Black Friday Home Deals

This is the absolute best time of year to buy a TV, an air purifier, vacuum, coffee maker or any electronic device. There is a lot to wade through right now, so we’re focusing on what we believe are the best buys per retailer on the Internet right now. Peruse the offerings from Amazon, Wayfair, Dyson and more—but don’t wait too long, many of these deals expire by midnight on Monday December 2.

Amazon

Time and time again, the mega-retailer has proven that it has some of the best early access deals around. We’ve spotted thousands of products on markdown in the home category, whether you’re looking for discounted smart Wi-Fi TVs, Dyson vacuum cleaners, or standing desks. Our tried and true? Bestsellers like Levoit Air purifiers and humidifiers or a KitchenAid stand mixer. Even our very favorite bath towels and bed sheets from the retailer are at the lowest price we’ve seen this year. Read our full Amazon Black Friday story to see what else we’ll be snagging throughout the weekend.

KitchenAid Artisan Stand Mixer

LEVOIT Smart Home Air Purifier

Chakir Turkish Linens Bathroom Towels (Set of 4)

De'Longhi Magnifica Evo Espresso & Coffee Machine

Wayfair

Much like Amazon, Wayfair always offers unbeatable prices on an extensive inventory of products. The major retailer already keeps things pretty affordable, but their Black Friday deals really knock things out of the park (see our full story on that here). Checking out all the low prices on decor is a good place to start, but don’t forget deals on other bigger items like mattresses, appliances (we see you Dyson cordless vacuums and deeply discounted Ninja blenders), and more.

Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner

Ninja Professional Blender 1000

Sealy to Go 12" Medium Memory Foam Mattress

Andover Mills Abdiel Upholstered Platform Bed

Dyson

The holy grail of home tech is offering up to $300 off their wares as we speak. While it applies to select items only, we spotted quite a few AD favorite vacuums and air purifiers with slashed price tags, including the Absolute cordless vac and the multitalented Dyson Purifier Humidify+Cool Formaldehyde. We can say with the utmost expertise that these are some of the lowest prices you'll see on Dyson goods all year. If a vacuum is all you have eyes (or budget) for this Black Friday you can see all of our faves on sale in this vacuum specific story.

Dyson V8 Absolute Cordless Vacuum

Dyson Purifier Humidify+Cool Formaldehyde

Samsung

Name a classier TV than the Frame, we’ll wait. The Yves Behar designed product was an instant classic when it debuted in 2017, and we’ve been spotting it in countless celebrity homes (and homes of stylish non-famous people) ever since. If you’re eager to try one for yourself, every size is discounted (up to $1,000 off the largest models). Their stylish cordless vacuum, the Bespoke Jet (a favorite of our contributor Terri Williams) isn’t too hard on the eyes—or wallet, for the time being–either. Terri praised the Bespoke Jet's self-emptying, self-charging capabilities saying the machine “takes the cleaning process to another level.”

SAMSUNG BESPOKE Jet Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner w/ Clean Station

55" Class The Frame QLED 4K LS03B

Black Friday Home Deals: Furniture & Decor

If new furniture is on your shopping list for the next year, there is truly no better time to purchase than right now. We might not see prices this low again on sofas, sectionals (more on that here), dining or office chairs and tables of all shapes and sizes until next Cyber Week. Hop to it with some of our favorite trusted retailers, listed below.

Serena & Lily

Open the Serena & Lily homepage and you’ll find one simple message: “Sale of the year.” The coastal-inspired retailer is discounting high quality furniture, bedding, and decor with various markdowns.

Belvedere Flannel Duvet Cover

Serena & Lily Albion Mohair Throw

Ellington Side Table

Wave Mirror

Castlery

Castlery is running a buy more save more deal on furniture finds like an MCM-style dining set or equally charming TV stand. We dedicated an entire story to the pieces we’re eyeing while the sale lasts.

Castlery Harper TV Stand

Castlery Madison Chaise Sectional Sofa

Pottery Barn

There are literally thousands of products on sale at Pottery Barn right now, but we did a little digging and found the best of the best, if we do say so ourselves. You can pick up great toy storage, bedding, and furniture for the smaller people in your life for the best price all year. We are also partial to their area rugs and this chic stainless steel ice bucket. Check out our full Pottery Barn Black Friday roundup here or enjoy this pared down selection of favorites below.

Pottery Barn Dream Modular Sofa Chaise Sectional

Crafthouse Ice Bucket with Tongs

Pottery Barn Merrin Hand-Knotted Wool Rug

Anthropologie

Now’s the perfect time to stock up on on-trend luxury furniture and decor at Anthropologie. The retailer’s early Black Friday deals are sweet, with up to 60% off sale items. On our list? Ornate credenzas, swirly tapered candles, statement mirrors, and plush armchairs.

Anthropologie Bree Mirrored Shelf

Anthropologie Woven Petunia Kori Modular Armless Sofa

West Elm

Show me a design lover who doesn’t have at least a few pieces from West Elm and I’ll show you one surprised home editor. For those who also find themselves constantly shopping the Brooklyn-based brand’s minimalist bedding and reliable mid-century modern style furniture, we’ve got good news—the home brand is currently offering up to 70% off a selection of their stock. That is not a small discount, so spend it wisely—perhaps on something from their Billy Cotton collection or their beloved Dalton sectional!

West Elm Billy Cotton Bennett Floor Lamp

West Elm Dalton Two-Piece Chaise Sectional

Branch

When we asked around about the best ergonomic office chairs, contributor Terri Williams told us the Ergonomic chair from Branch “looks as good as it feels.” Use code BFCM to save up to 30% and get free shipping on any order from Branch.

Branch Ergonomic Chair

Branch Verve Chair

Article

Article has has come through with up to 40% off a selection of their stock right now. Whether you’re redecorating the living room or upgrading your home office, you can now get up to 40% off stylish furniture for every room in the house—and they‘ve added new discounts since the sale kicked off earlier this week, so keep checking back. Their sofas are already affordable—and we know for a fact that they’re well made—so this is your time to make it happen.

Article Sven Sofa

Article Cilo Ivory Bouclé Ottoman

SSENSE

If you try plan your year around SSENSE’s confusing sale schedule, you’re in luck—right now, save up to 50% off select items that'll make great gifts for everyone on your list or even a nice pick-me-up for yourself. And did we mention they carry great furniture pieces as well?

FERM LIVING Brown Os Salad Servers

STUDIO KALLANG Black & Beige Small Onde Mirror

Design Within Reach

Not to exaggerate here but this is pretty much unheard of: The entirety of DWR’s stock is 25% off right now. There are iconic pieces from Noguchi and Herman Miller on sale (including the cult-favorite Aeron and Embody office chairs) as well as modern classics like the Sarah Ellison Muse Sofa and all things Muuto and HAY. If that’s not enticing enough, you’ll find hoards of midcentury sofas, coffee tables, and modern accessories like rugs and tableware from Knoll and handful of other brands that are all an extra 5% off with the code SAVE5.

Herman Miller Aeron Chair

J.L.Møllers Møbelfabrik Moller Model 57 Armchair

Bertoia Side Chair

Ellison Studios Muse Sofa

Soho Home

If you’ve ever wanted your house’s decor to look like the inside of Soho House without the membership fees, now is your chance. The London-based social club sells its own line of home goods (Soho Home) inspired by the decor it uses to outfit its physical locations across the world, allowing members and non-members to keep the social spirit alive without actually visiting a Soho House in person. While each club has a distinct personality, the through lines remain the same, giving each one a familiar feeling while still being inspired by its location, such as London, New York, Barcelona or Los Angeles. Right now you can save 20% off the entire range of categories, which include furniture, textiles, accessories and dining products.

Margeaux Oblong Cushion

Soho Home Vivienne Armchair

Arhaus

This is Cyber Week furniture deals at their best: Save up to 20% off during the Arhaus Cyber Monday sale. The deals apply to holiday decor, home accents like throws and pillows, and tons of high end furniture, including staff faves like the Kipton sofa. Here is a snippet from AD Pro associate director Lila Allen’s review of the Kipton to get you moving in the right direction: “I find this sofa to be really cushy and enveloping, but let’s be clear: This is not an upright and formal sit,” she says of the piece. “It’s lazy and low, but still supportive. My feet tend to dangle toddler-style if I’m facing forward and really sinking into my slouch, but an ottoman (or coffee table—sorry, mom) fixes that. When I want to be more upright, I find myself sometimes sitting cross-legged, and have plenty of support through the back cushion. The upholstery on the frame is tight and flawless.”

Wagner Round Dining Table

Kipton Sofa

Revival Rugs

One of our very favorite rug makers is offering up to 30% off sitewide as we speak! We just wrapped up testing their Hart Jute area rug and it received the accolade of “best Just Rug” when all was said and done. Here is what senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums enjoys about the piece: “I love a jute rug as a neutral, durable, area rug,” she says. “This one softened up a multipurpose guest room/office that’s frequented by cats who enjoy clawing the furniture, a.k.a. this rug can handle some claws and not look worse for the wear. This large, affordable rug is the perfect way to add texture to a space without dominating the design, and it seems incredibly durable.” Speaking of affordable, this particular model is $75 off for an 8'x10' rug.

Revival Hart Jute Rug

Sixpenny

At this point we have maybe lost track of how many AD editors have Sixpenny products in their homes (global editorial director Amy Astley even has one in her office!). We have tested many Nevas, Oleas, and Esmé’s from the brand—and the reviews are all positive! Good thing the Brooklyn-based brand is currently offering 20% off sitewide. Take it from Zoë Sessums once again, who has had the Neva sectional sofa in her home for several years.

“Two-year update: My Neva sectional has continued to be a wonderful piece of furniture and you would never guess that I’ve had it for this long,” she says. “It’s amazing that all the cushions still have so much oomph—I don’t feel like any of them have less fullness or support. My cats love sleeping on the top of the back cushions, so sometimes I have to perk them up and squish the fill around—but it always springs back. I’ve had many houseguests, many dogs, and many children enjoy the sofa. It’s held up for tall friends sleeping over, it’s held up for small children pretending it’s a trampoline, and it’s held up when a new dog decides to chase my cats across the cushions. This sofa feels nearly indestructible!”

Sixpenny Neva Chaise Sectional

Black Friday Home Deals: Bedding & Mattresses

Planning to spend a good amount of time under the covers in 2025? Us, too. And for that we'll all need the best foundation possible: fresh sheets, great loungewear, and a nice set of towels to wash the day away. There is something you should probably know about us: we love sleep. So much so that we've tested upwards of 30 mattresses and sleep-related products, all in the name of making sure you have recommendations you can rely on. Much like furniture, Cyber Week is the time to invest in a mattress at a discounted price if you're looking to enter the new year with a new sleep setup. A few (OK, quite a few) of our favorite are below. And we also have a dedicated roundup of all of the best Black Friday mattress deals we have come across.

Cozy Earth

If you’re searching for some super-cozy sheets, bath towels, or loungewear, check out Cozy Earth’s early Black Friday sale. We’re partial to the cooling bamboo sheet set, which features a sateen finish that feels silky to the touch whenever you snuggle in. Commerce editor Audrey Lee was taken with her set immediately: “Sleeping on these sheets felt like being draped in a luxuriously lightweight silk that often had me wishing I didn’t have to get out of bed in the morning” she says. “At first, I immediately noticed how next-level soft the bamboo viscose fabric was and how nicely the fitted sheet clung my bed.”

Cozy Earth Bamboo Sheet Set

Cozy Earth Silk Pillow

Cozy Earth Linen Bamboo Duvet Cover

Cozy Earth Comforter

Cozy Earth Women’s Stretch-Knit Bamboo Kimono Robe

Parachute

A wide swatch of Parachute products are deeply discount right now, from the brand’s cozy duvets to the crowd favorite robe that made our Editor’s Picks gift guide. While the brand offers percale and linen, it’s their Cloud products that really set them apart from the crowd. “I’ve never felt more luxurious than when I wrap myself up in this cushy robe post-shower,” says commerce producer Lauren Arzbaecher of her Cloud Cotton Robe. “Wash after wash, it’s stayed super soft.”

Cloud Cotton Robe

Organic Cloud Cotton Quilt

Linen Shower Curtain

Parachute Linen Duvet Cover

Avocado

The Black Friday sale season is hands down the best time to buy a mattress. Get quality, organic sleep in time for the holiday season with up to 20% off a top-rated Avocado mattress or 10% off accoutrements like a mattress topper or pillow. Looking for more fabulous mattress savings? We‘ve got you covered there, too.

Avocado Green

Avocado Eco Organic Mattress Topper, Queen Size

Boll & Branch

If you’re on the hunt for classic and luxurious bedding to curl up in (and who isn’t?), you can find select styles available at some mega discounts on Boll & Branch. Save 25% on orders over $300 with the code CYBER25. Contributor Erika Owen recommends the Hemmed Duvet Set, “especially if you’re a hot sleeper prone to night sweats” or one of their organic sheet sets.

Boll & Branch Signature Hemmed Duvet Set

Flannel Classic Plaid Duvet Set

Buffy

Buffy, creators of the original Cloud Comforter (tested and reviewed by us!) and lighter weight little sibling the Breeze, are offering 25% off sitewide for Cyber Week. If you haven’t given Buffy a try yet, here is a sneak peek at what senior digital design editor Sydney Gore had to say about the Cloud: “I’ve been using this comforter since the brand dropped it in 2017 and have never looked back. It’s light, soft, breathable…everything you would ever want in a comforter that stays on your bed all year round.”

Buffy Cloud Comforter

Ralph Lauren

If your taste skews more Americana—or you want to channel Yolanda Hadid’s Texas ranch—you might want to see what classic Ralph Lauren styles are currently up to 40% off for the holiday weekend. Go nautical with some striped bedding or deck the halls with a They’ve also discounted great glassware and very giftable decor so you can get your holiday shopping done simultaneously.

Ralph Lauren Home Organic Cotton Shirting Stripe Sheeting

Ralph Lauren Home Hudson Plaid Ornament

Saatva

Whether you’re looking for a light bedding refresh like a fresh new pillow or a total overhaul of your sleep setup (we’re talking mattress, bed frame, the whole deal) Saatva’s very good Cyber Week sale is the place to go for luxury bedding at solid discounts.

Saatva Latex Pillow

Saatva Rx Mattress

Morrow Soft Goods

No one does color quite like the team at Morrow Soft Goods. The brand excels in earthy neutrals that don’t feel crunchy granola and remain elevated. We’re also fans of their checked, striped, and ticking patterns. Right now, select items on the site are 20% off. Items that are marked as final sale are 30% off (a fair bet if you’d like to stock up on old faithfuls!). The sale runs through December 3rd and we have a feeling stock is limited, as it tends to be with smaller and more homegrown brands, so get to it.

Adela Throw Blanket

Heirloom Linen Classic Sheet Set

Nectar: Up to 40% off everything

If you’re looking to score a new mattress (at a discount!), consider one of AD’s most decorated sleep brands, Nectar. The Nectar mattress, which has received the top mattress award in our Sleep Awards is a somewhat unbelievable $917 off during Cyber Week. Not one but two of our staffers–senior SEO manager Katie Henwood and digital features editor Nick Mafi–have slept soundly on their Nectar purchases and we can recommend it without hesitation. If you want a one-stop-shopping experience, you can also pick up a new bed frame to support your investment.

The Nectar Memory Foam Mattress

The Nectar Platform Bed

Coyuchi

We have put Coyuchi linens to the test and, so far, they have stood both the test of time and the test of design editors. Global features director, Sam Cochran, described the organic relaxed linen sheets this year as “heavy, quality linen,” and this set, along with everything else at the luxe linen brand is 25% off, plus free shipping.

Coyuchi Organic Relaxed Linen Sheets

Double-Stitched Quilted Organic Cotton Comforter

Balsam Hill

The perfect artificial Christmas tree does exist—and you can find it at Balsam Hill, along with and all the trimmings you need to nail your holiday decor. We’ve tested several of their trees ourselves and can attest to the quality and longevity of their products, so you might want to act fast because they do in fact sell out.
